short_description: performance authority is an auto service based in bend, oregon, united states.
long_description: we are here to be your trusted mechanical team whether you need an oil service, inspection, brake service, engine or transmission replacement and so much more. we upgrade, service, maintain and repair ford / chevy / dodge diesel trucks. we offer performance modifications to improve vehicle drivability & dependability for all applications. are you looking to enhance the suspension on your offroad vehcile or do you just want a smoother allaround ride. performance authority has the proper tools and technology to offer quick and comprehensive diagnostics and inspections.
